nodes.text: The Mytaranor Campaign was a conflict that the mercenary Saponza claimed to have participated in by 3 ABY. While seeking work, he included the campaign in the experience section of his listing on the Undervine, although the listing received no response for over a month, which the mercenary complained about in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide. The campaign shared its name with the Mytaranor sector, which was located in the Mid Rim.
The Mytaranor Campaign was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
